citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15pm on 15 March
2023.
An employee came out of the facility when I knocked and stated that she was not authorized to lead an inspection. She
instructed me to call another contact who was also not available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15pm on 15 March 
2023.  
 
An employee came out of the facility when I knocked and stated that she was not authorized to lead an inspection. She 
instructed me to call another contact who was also not available. 
 
 
 
End Section
